articles.author: Karina Tsui, Andy Rose
articles.title: Roy Ayers, legendary musician behind hit song ‘Everybody Loves the Sunshine,’ dies at 84 - CNN
articles.description: The legendary American vibraphonist, composer and pioneer of jazz-funk died Tuesday, his family said. He was 84.
articles.content:
Roy Ayers, the legendary American vibraphonist, composer and pioneer of jazz-funk, died Tuesday, his family said. He was 84.
